entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump It's a shame that you'd rather distract us with flags, monuments, and other b.s. while you continue to politicize the #COVID19 pandemic, causing 125,000 deaths, try again to take away the #ACA and do nothing as #Putin pays for our U.S. military to be murdered. #TrumpIsKillingUs
